channel.title: 2012 on Tardigrade's dev blog
channel.description: Recent content in 2012 on Tardigrade's dev blog

item.title: [Android] Card Games
item.description: Solitaire! A Klondike game, easy to play on a smartphone touch screen. Instead of using inaccurate drag-and-drop to select a particular card stack, just click the source pile, then the destination pile, and let the computer manage the move. Google Play Store : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.robglu.solitaire Freecell! A Freecell game easy to play on a smartphone touch screen. Instead of using inaccurate drag-and-drop to select a particular card stack, just click the source pile, then the destination pile, and let the computer manage the move.
